articles.description: Carlos Alcaraz made more history by beating Diego Schwartzman in the Rio Open final and breaking records set by fellow Spaniard Rafeal Nadal.
articles.content:
'I can't believe it'- Alcaraz on winning the Rio Open title in maiden win
00:01:20
